name: RemoteStatus

types.name: Model
types.comment:
Store the status of a remote operation, differentiating between unstarted,
in progress and completed states.

values.name: enqueue
values.comment: Increase the number of remote operations to track.

values.name: finishOne
values.comment: Increase the number of operations that have been completed by 1.

values.name: initial
values.comment: Default the status to not started.

values.name: isFinished
values.comment: Determine whether the operations have completed.

values.name: isInProgress
values.comment: Determine whether the operations are still in progress.

values.name: start
values.comment: Start tracking the remote operation if the status is in it's initial state.
